content: Task deployment-guide completed. Created backend/Dockerfile, frontend/Dockerfile, and deployment_guide.md. Refactored backend and frontend to support environment variables for production.

message: Task scalability-strategy completed. Created SCALABILITY.md and updated SPEC.md and README.md with scalability considerations.
Authentication and Authorization verified with new unit tests in tests/test_auth.py. All 6 tests passed. Updated TODO.md.

details: Fixed syntax errors in frontend composable, verified backend WebSocket tests, and updated SPEC.md with WebSocket protocol details.
